sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_FRAME_RECORD(
CONCAT_FRAME, CONCAT_DATA, PROCESSOR, PROCESSOR_ID, CONTEXT, CHOSEN,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME, ORG, ORG_TREE) values(
#concatFrame#, #concatData#, #processor#, #processorId#, #context#, #chosen#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#, #org#, #orgTree#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_FRAME_RECORD SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_FRAME_RECORD.CONCAT_FRAME AS concatFrame, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CONCAT_DATA AS concatData, TB_FRAME_RECORD.PROCESSOR AS processor, TB_FRAME_RECORD.PROCESSOR_ID AS processorId, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CONTEXT AS context, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CHOSEN AS chosen,
TB_FRAME_RECORD.ID AS id, TB_FRAME_RECORD.STATUS AS status, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CREATED AS created, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_FRAME_RECORD.UPDATED AS updated, TB_FRAME_RECORD.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_FRAME_RECORD where TB_FRAME_RECORD.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_FRAME_RECORD
CONCAT_FRAME=#concatFrame# CONCAT_DATA=#concatData# PROCESSOR=#processor# PROCESSOR_ID=#processorId# CONTEXT=#context# CHOSEN=#chosen#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_FRAME_RECORD.CONCAT_FRAME AS concatFrame, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CONCAT_DATA AS concatData, TB_FRAME_RECORD.PROCESSOR AS processor, TB_FRAME_RECORD.PROCESSOR_ID AS processorId, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CONTEXT AS context, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CHOSEN AS chosen,
TB_FRAME_RECORD.ID AS id, TB_FRAME_RECORD.STATUS AS status, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CREATED AS created, TB_FRAME_RECORD.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_FRAME_RECORD.UPDATED AS updated, TB_FRAME_RECORD.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_FRAME_RECORD WHERE TB_FRAME_RECORD.STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FRAME_RECORD WHERE TB_FRAME_RECORD.STATUS = '1'
